name: GreenTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Green Tip of the Day gives you a great tip every day to live a more green lifestyle!

Every day you will get a tip about saving energy, recycling, saving water, shopping green and more! All of the tips are designed to be easy to understand and more importantly, easy to do!

Go Green Today! Enable Green Tip of the Day
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
